problem.markdown:
Chris wishes to carpet the rectangular room shown above. To the nearest square yard, how many square yards of carpet are needed to carpet the floor of the room if the closet floor will not be carpeted? (1 square yard = 9 square feet)

= 8
problem.p: Chris wishes to carpet the rectangular room shown above. To the nearest square yard, how many square yards of carpet are needed to carpet the floor of the room if the closet floor will not be carpeted? (1 square yard = 9 square feet)
